attributes.action: Change the way the London Mayor is elected.
attributes.additional_details: London is our capital, and we want to restore national pride in that great city. Too many of us feel afraid or unwilling to visit London because of the crime rate, the poor public transport system, and the general run-down state of the once-proud city. We want tourists to feel welcomed and safe, and we want a say in major decisions affecting our capital, including new buildings, road systems and policing.The only way we can do this is by voting for the Mayor of our choice. Our City, our Mayor.
attributes.background: Allow all English citizens of voting age to vote in the election of all future London Mayors.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for the same action: 

Grant the vote for London Mayor to all UK Residents
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715511
